 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרֵשׂ‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==belly== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּרֶס‎</span> ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּרְסָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כראס‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כארסא‎</span>, ***uterus***, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 151, 157</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wrinkled*** or ***folded stomach*** of cud-chewing animals; compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 20, 44</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***karšu***</u></abbr>, ***body***, ***belly***); — only suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרֵשׂוֺ‎</span> [[Jer.51.34|Jer 51:34]] of Nebuchadrezzar under figure of sea-monster.
